statements: SELECT username FROM AppData WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM AppData WHERE last_sync < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM AppData WHERE last_sync BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM AppData WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM AppData ORDER BY last_sync DESC;
SELECT * FROM AppData WHERE user_id = 1 AND username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT email, phone_number FROM AppData WHERE last_sync < '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM AppData ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM AppData WHERE data IS NOT NULL AND phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT username, email FROM AppData WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM offline_data;
SELECT id, data FROM offline_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT app_name, app_version FROM mobile_apps WHERE app_id = 'app1';
SELECT * FROM mobile_apps ORDER BY app_version DESC;
SELECT app_id, app_version FROM mobile_apps WHERE app_version > 2.0;
SELECT * FROM offline_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, data->>'key' as key_value FROM offline_data WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM offline_data WHERE data->>'status' = 'completed';
SELECT app_name, app_version FROM mobile_apps WHERE app_version >= 1.2 ORDER BY app_name ASC;
SELECT app_name, COUNT(*) as app_count FROM mobile_apps GROUP BY app_name HAVING app_count > 5;

SELECT id, data, timestamp FROM offline_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, user_email FROM mobile_users WHERE user_id = 100;

SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM app_settings ORDER BY setting_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM app_settings WHERE setting_name = 'theme';

SELECT setting_id, app_name, setting_value FROM app_settings WHERE app_name = 'MyApp' ORDER BY setting_id;
